entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
